quotes.message: There is no stability without solidarity and no solidarity without stability.
quotes.name: Jose Manuel Barroso

quotes.message: The first step in the evolution of ethics is a sense of solidarity with other human beings.
quotes.name: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: You don't fight racism with racism, the best way to fight racism is with solidarity.
quotes.name: Bobby Seale

quotes.message: Solidarity was the best thing which happened in the 20th century.
quotes.name: Mikheil Saakashvili

quotes.message: The most important word in the language of the working class is 'solidarity.
quotes.name: Harry Bridges

quotes.message: If someone puts their hands on you make sure they never put their hands on anybody else again.
quotes.name: Malcolm X

quotes.message: Solidarity and competitiveness are the two sides of a European coin.
quotes.name: Angela Merkel

quotes.message: You can't always be demanding solidarity from others and then refuse to show it yourself.
quotes.name: Martin Schulz

quotes.message: Solidarity is based on the principle that we are willing to put ourselves at risk to protect each other.
quotes.name: Starhawk

quotes.message: There will be no equity without solidarity. There will be no justice without a social movement.
quotes.name: Joia Mukherjee

quotes.message: A people cannot exist if there is no social solidarity.
quotes.name: Ariel Sharon

quotes.message: There is no true peace without fairness , truth , justice and solidarity.
quotes.name: Pope John Paul II

quotes.message: Solidarity is not a feeling of vague compassion or shallow distress at the misfortunes of so many people, both near and far. On the contrary, it is a firm and persevering determination to commit oneself to the common good; that is to say to the good of all and of each individual, because we are all really responsible for all.
quotes.name: Pope John Paul II

quotes.message: Solidarity is not discovered by reflection but created.
quotes.name: Richard M. Rorty

quotes.message: Solidarity between women can be a powerful force of change, and can influence future development in ways favourable not only to women but also to men.
quotes.name: Nawal El-Saadawi

quotes.message: Great opportunities to help others seldom come, but small ones surround us every day.
quotes.name: Sally Koch

quotes.message: Solidarity is not an act of charity, but mutual aid between forces fighting for the same objective.
quotes.name: Samora Machel

quotes.message: The purpose of human life is to serve and to show compassion and the will to help others.
quotes.name: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: With solidarity, you will be more talented and handier, you will be taller and stronger, faster and wiser!
quotes.name: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.message: He who once became aware of the power of Solidarity and who breathed the air of freedom will not be crushed.
quotes.name: Lech Walesa

quotes.message: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: We must indeed all hang together, or, most assuredly, we shall all hang separately.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: A sense of solidarity among fifteen-to-thirty-year-olds would be a menace to civilized society even in the best of times.
quotes.name: Steven Pinker

quotes.message: We must learn to live together as brothers or perish together as fools.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.message: Every human being is called to solidarity in a world battling between life and death.
quotes.name: Ignacio Ellacuria

quotes.message: It is wonderful to be in solidarity with another big group of people.
quotes.name: Ruqaiyyah Waris Maqsood

quotes.message: Sometimes we find the sweetest solidarity in the midst of solitude.
quotes.name: Curtis Tyrone Jones

quotes.message: True solidarity is only possible among the solitary.
quotes.name: Jose Bergamin

quotes.message: We must speak our minds openly, debate our disagreements honestly, but always pursue solidarity.
quotes.name: Donald Trump
